title: Get dictionary entries for a letter head.
name: BrowseDictionaryEntries
description: Gets dictionary or reversal entries that match the specified letter head. Returns ReversalEntryItem's if entryType == 'reversalindexentry' else DictionaryEntryItem's. (https://github.com/sillsdev/webonary/blob/develop/webonary-cloud-api/lambda/entry.model.ts)

Parameter.description: Letter head to browse.
Main language of the dictionary, used for setting the db locale.
Language to search through. This must be specified for browsing reversal entries.
Type of the entry to get: 'entry' for main entry and 'reversalindexentry' for reversal entry. Defaults to 'entry'.
1 to return only the count, and 0 otherwise. Defaults to 0.
1-indexed page number for the results. Defaults to 1.
Number of entries per page. Max is 100. Defaults to 100.

title: Delete dictionary
name: DeleteDictionary
description: Deletes a dictionary and all its associated entries, returning the count of everything deleted.

Header.description: Basic Auth value corresponding to Webonary dictionary site's admin username and password

title: Delete entry
name: DeleteEntry
description: Deletes a dictionary main or reversal entry.

Parameter.description: Id of the entry.
Type of the entry to get: 'entry' for main entry and 'reversalindexentry' for reversal entry. Defaults to 'entry'.

Header.description: Basic Auth value corresponding to Webonary dictionary site's admin username and password

Success 200.description: Css files used to displaying entries from this language (in order)
Parts of speech short codes for this language
Reversal languages defined for the main language
Css files used to displaying entries from this language (in order)
Number of reversal entries for this reversal language and dictionary
Semantic Domains used in dictionary entries (language specific)
Time (UTC) that the dictionary metadata was last updated. Updates to the dictionary and reversal entries do not count. See Date.prototype.toUTCString() for format details.
Username of the person who performed the last update to the dictionary metadata. Updates to the dictionary and reversal entries do not count.

404.description: Cannot find a dictionary with the supplied id.

title: Get dictionary or reversal entry
name: GetDictionaryEntry
description: Gets a single dictionary or reversal entry. Returns a ReversalEntryItem if entryType == 'reversalindexentry' else a DictionaryEntryItem. (https://github.com/sillsdev/webonary/blob/develop/webonary-cloud-api/lambda/entry.model.ts)

Parameter.description: Id of the entry.
Type of the entry to get: 'entry' for main entry and 'reversalindexentry' for reversal entry. Defaults to 'entry'.

title: Post dictionary
description: Calling this API will insert or update metadata for a dictionary
name: PostDictionary

Post Body.description: Parts of speech short codes for this language
Css files used to displaying entries from this language (in order)
Reversal languages defined for the main language
Parts of speech short codes for this language
Css files used to displaying entries from this language (in order)
Semantic Domains used in dictionary entries (language specific)

Success 200.description: Timestamp of the posting of dictionary metadata in GMT

Header.description: Basic Auth value corresponding to Webonary dictionary site's admin username and password

400.description: Input should be a valid JSON object for this API call

403.description: Incorrect user credentials or user is not authorized to post to the dictionary

examples.title: Bad Request Example
ErrorForbidden
SyntaxError Example
TypeError Example

title: Post entry
description: Calling this API will allow posting of up to 50 dictionary entries. If the entry guid already exists, update will occur instead of an insert.
name: PostDictionaryEntry

Post Body.description: Letter that this entry should be listed under
ISO language code for the head word
ISO language code for the reversal entry
Semantic Domains used in dictionary entries (language specific)

Success 200.description: Timestamp of the posting of entries in GMT
Array containing GUID of the inserted entries

Header.description: Basic Auth value corresponding to Webonary dictionary site's admin username and password

400.description: Input should be a valid JSON object for this API call

403.description: Incorrect user credentials or user is not authorized to post to the dictionary

examples.title: Bad Request Example
ErrorForbidden
SyntaxError Example
TypeError Example

title: Post file signed URL
description: Calling this API will return a signed URL which can be used to upload a file temporarily to a protected S3 bucked.
name: PostDictionaryFileSignedUrl

Post Body.description: Relative file path, starting with dictionary name

Success 200.description: Signed URL to upload a file to AWS S3 Bucket

403.description: Incorrect user credentials or user is not authorized to post to the dictionary

Error 4xx.description: Input should be an be an object containing objectId and action ("putObject").

examples.title: BadRequest Example
ErrorForbidden

Header.description: Basic Auth value corresponding to Webonary dictionary site's admin username and password

title: Put file
description: This signed URL will temporarily allow posting a file to a protected S3 bucket.
name: PutDictionaryFile

Header.description: Valid mime type (e.g. image/jpeg, audio/mpeg, video/mpeg, etc)

Error 4xx.description: Access is denied if the temporarily signed URL is no longer valid.

examples.title: Forbidden Error Example
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden AccessDenied Request has expired 120 2020-04-25T03:48:04Z 2020-04-25T03:50:33Z BF97CB31633F3C94 WNR6dm5Dlr/B5hs+izoGaBueMObntiXi9D1q+SmvT06FuDfmCNx4c5pNhpw1HcHB75KlMYP6SSs=

title: Search dictionary entries
name: SearchDictionaryEntries
description: Searches the dictionary for entries that match. Returns an array of DictionaryEntryItem's. (https://github.com/sillsdev/webonary/blob/develop/webonary-cloud-api/lambda/entry.model.ts)

Parameter.description: Main language of the dictionary, used for setting the db locale.
Language to search through.
Filter results by part of speech.
1 to allow partial matches, and 0 otherwise. Defaults to 0.
1 to match accents, and 0 otherwise. Defaults to 0.
Filter by semantic domain abbreviation.
1 to search by demantic domains, and 0 otherwise. Defaults to 0.
1 to return only the count, and 0 otherwise. Defaults to 0.
1-indexed page number for the results. Defaults to 1.
Number of entries per page. Max is 100. Defaults to 100.
